title: (x) The Ellington logo - Versailles {Patricia}
content:
does anyone have any idea what this rather lackluster logo is using for a font? the words “The Ellington” at the top of this page?  
 [http://www.ellingtonnyc.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20071010113441/http:/www.ellingtonnyc.com/ "http://www.ellingtonnyc.com/")

thank you!

 [‹ (x) Learn Your Lines ultra black sans - Gotham {Tiff}](http://web.archive.org/web/20071010113441/http:/typophile.com/node/19313 "Go to previous forum topic") [Kojima! ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071010113441/http:/typophile.com/node/19304 "Go to next forum topic")
author: gee_double_you

comments.content:
Versailles Roman, a serif font, not a sans serif

[http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/versailles/roman/testdrive.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20071010113441/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/versailles/roman/testdrive.html "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/versailles/roman/testdrive.html")
